Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop

Interface ConnectionInfo

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultConnectionInfo
    public interface ConnectionInfo
    Provides information about an established connection.

    This interface is passed to ClientHandler.onConnected(org.bluezoo.gumdrop.ConnectionInfo) to provide details about the connection, including network addresses and TLS information if the connection is secure.

    Author:
    Chris Burdess
    See Also:
    ClientHandler.onConnected(org.bluezoo.gumdrop.ConnectionInfo), TLSInfo

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.net.InetSocketAddress getLocalAddress()
      Returns the local socket address.
      java.net.InetSocketAddress getRemoteAddress()
      Returns the remote socket address.
      TLSInfo getTLSInfo()
      Returns TLS information for secure connections.
      boolean isSecure()
      Returns whether the connection is secured with TLS.

    • Method Detail

      • getLocalAddress

        java.net.InetSocketAddress getLocalAddress()
        Returns the local socket address.

        This includes the local IP address and the ephemeral port assigned by the operating system for this connection.

        Returns:
        the local socket address

      • getRemoteAddress

        java.net.InetSocketAddress getRemoteAddress()
        Returns the remote socket address.

        This is the address and port of the server we connected to. For most connections this matches the address used to create the client, but may differ if DNS returned multiple addresses and one was selected.

        Returns:
        the remote socket address

      • isSecure

        boolean isSecure()
        Returns whether the connection is secured with TLS.

        For connections using implicit TLS (LDAPS, SMTPS, HTTPS), this will be true from the start. For connections that upgrade via STARTTLS, this will be true after the upgrade completes.

        Returns:
        true if the connection is using TLS

      • getTLSInfo

        TLSInfo getTLSInfo()
        Returns TLS information for secure connections.

        This provides details about the TLS session including the protocol version, cipher suite, and certificates.

        Returns:
        TLS information, or null if the connection is not secure
